verses.roman:
mo-adhame dila śrī-govinda daraśana
kahibāra kathā nahe akathya-kathana

synonyms: mo-adhame—to one as abominable as me; dila—delivered; śrī-govinda daraśana—the audience of Lord Śrī Govinda; kahibāra—to speak this; kathā—words; nahe—there are not; akathya—unspeakable; kathana—narration.
translation: He granted to one as low as me the sight of Lord Govinda. Words cannot describe this, nor is it fit to be disclosed.
